text: Well after those daysWhich ones? Presumably “the days of his service” in verse 23. his wife Elizabeth became pregnant and stayed in seclusion five months.Her menopause was ancient history, so what was happening was ‘impossible’; besides, even if she was pregnant the likelihood of a miscarriage would be high; so she kept quiet. But after five months she would begin to ‘show’, and the prospect of success was good. She kept saying,
